divs: Sighting DetailsFIRST OF ALL I DONT SPELL VERY GOOD OK NOW I WAS WALKING HOME ONE NIGHT AND I GOT THE FEELING I WAS BEING WACHED AND I STOPED WALKING AND LOOKED UP AT THE SKY AND SAW A STArLIKE CIRCL IN THE SKY AND WHEN I WOULD MOVE IT WOULD MOVE IF I MOVED FAST IT WOULD TO SO I KIND OF GOT VERY VERY SKARD WHEN I SAW THIS SO I STARED TALKING OUT LOUD AND I SAID I KNOW IM NOTY CRAZY THEN I STOPED AND SHINDED MY FLASHLIGHT AT IT AND THEN IT STARTED DOWN TO ME SLOWLEE AND THEN STOPED AND I SAD OUT LOUD TO IT I KNOW YOU KNOW I SEE YOU FOLLING ME SO I SAID OUT WHY DONT YOU JUST COME DOWN And talk to me and all of a suddun it came very fast right at me it got as close to me as the power lines was and i said oh [pd] and i took off runnig and gotin the house when i got in i could not see it any more i dont want my face on tv but i dont mind to talk to you and show youwear it happend sorry about my spelling
